blog:item.title: New DeeEnEs and some site changes
blog:item.blog:content: Uploaded an updated version of DeeEnEs. Changed the menu-handling somewat so Netscape users can actually use it. For one reason or another the fold-out menu doesn't want to work with Netscape 6 or Mozilla Seamonkey M15. The "places" section in "My Photos" is now shown in two columns, it looks better that way and allows for more places to be shown at once.
